${ModID}:GoldenRod.NAME: Golden Rod
${ModID}:GoldenRod.FLAVOR: This menacing item allows you to manifest the power of your misfortune in creative ways.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a #yCurse, ALL enemies lose %d HP.

${ModID}:Pearl.NAME: Pearl
${ModID}:Pearl.FLAVOR: A beautiful rounded gem, not a single scratch is to be seen on its surface.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play %d or less cards during your turn, gain %d #yBlock at the end of your turn.

${ModID}:DowsingRod.NAME: Dowsing Rod
${ModID}:DowsingRod.FLAVOR: A pair of gadgets meant to lead its wielders to riches.

${ModID}:CremationUrn.NAME: Cremation Urn
${ModID}:CremationUrn.FLAVOR: Collecting ashes within seems to empower you.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yexhaust a card, #yUpgrade a random card in your hand for the rest of combat.

${ModID}:StickyGlove.NAME: Sticky Glove
${ModID}:StickyGlove.FLAVOR: It sticks to your hand as much as it sticks to anything else it touches.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a #ySlimed into your hand. The leftmost card in your hand is #yretained each turn.

${ModID}:SpeedCharm.NAME: Speed Charm
${ModID}:SpeedCharm.FLAVOR: With this in tow, the winds guide your step.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw %d additional card.
